base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with modern design.
part_description: Includes two doors and one drawer, all with horizontal handles, arranged symmetrically on the front.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides open horizontally above the two doors, which swing outward. The handles facilitate easy access to the interior storage spaces, allowing for organized storage within the cabinet.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, providing storage in kitchens or bathrooms. It interacts with users through the handles for opening and closing, and can support items on its flat top surface.
